titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to include a provision on organic conversion in the environmental quality incentives program.
A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to include a provision on organic conversion in the environmental quality incentives program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to establish a program under the environmental quality incentives program to provide eligible producers with cost-share and incentive payments to promote conservation practices for production systems converting to organic production.
